CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 4, 1941, pg. 4 reads: "The Kay Boys' club has just completed two busy weeks of activity, during which time holiday parties and special exhibits were features of a well-rounded program. Above are scenes from some of the programs held during Christmas week.  Left to right:...Right: Some of the 4,000 children who attended the gigantic kiddie party last week. - Photos by Harris"
TitMainTitle: large group of children, and adults, including man in foreground holding girl and plate of food, gathered in Kay Boys Club, with tinsel garland decorations, for Christmas party
